title: Linguine with prawns and mussels
description: This dish makes a great Friday night supper. Everywhere you go along the coastline of Italy it will be offered to you in some form or another, perhaps with cozze e vongole (mussels and clams), patelle (limpets) and moscardini (baby octopus), scallops, squid, and/or a combination of all of them.
ingredients: small bunch flatleaf parsley, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
